text: Jennifer Antony is an Indian actress and model. She took part in the beauty pageant contest Miss Bangalore and won it in 1992, gained popularity and entered into the Kannada and Malayalam film industry. She is also a professional painter. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Language!!
